org.openscience.cdk.io

Interface IChemObjectReaderErrorHandler


  • public interface IChemObjectReaderErrorHandler
    Interface for classes aimed to handle IChemObjectReader errors.
    Author:
    Egon Willighagen
    Belongs to CDK module:
    io
    Source code:
    master

      • handleError

        void handleError(String message,
               int row,
               int colStart,
               int colEnd)
        Method that should react on an error message send by an IChemObjectReader.
        Parameters:
        message - Error found while reading.
        row - Row in the file where the error is found.
        colStart - Start column in the file where the error is found.
        colEnd - End column in the file where the error is found.
